basics.name: William Zhu
basics.label: Programmer
basics.summary: Self motivated web developer with a passion for programming, creating applications and websites. Passionate about programming and enjoys overcoming challenges that come with it. Constantly in the pursuit of learning new technologies and seeking opportunities for growth .

work.summary: This app is a portfolio management system designed for Barometer Capital Management Inc. Assisting Asset Managers with recoding of trades needed to be made and saved for each portfolio
highlights: Used the Alpha API to display information customized to display wanted output
Worked on functionality of the React App
Provide technical leadership to cross-functional team members and build trusting relationships.

work.summary: Our group wanted to created a website where poeple could search for comic book heros products, story, movies. Focused on peopel who don't understand much about comic book heros
highlights: Created websites using various api's and technologies
Experienced with GitHub, coordinating work on files among multiple people
Optimized an algorithm that holds the current world record for Weisman Scores

volunteer.summary: Experienced opening up a new restaurant with incredible people, an joyful experience learning about the struggle of building something from the bottom and working to make it bigger

education.institution: University of Toronto School Of Continuing Studies
courses: Experienced with html, CSS, JavaScript and various Back-End languages
Learned to work in groups created projects and to communicate with each other
Experienced using branches, pushing, pulling, merging on GitHub
Learned and applied MVC and Object Oriented Programming
